name: Yokotroit - (Completed Game Demo)
description:
Yokotroit is a 2D pixel art stealth point-and-click set in a cyberpunk dystopia. The player follows Shenna Sato as she and her sidekick, Watson, solve crimes across the city.

Controls

  • Left Click: Movement, Pickup Items, Use Items
  • Right Click: Control Dog
  • E Key: Open Door, Hide
  • C Key: Crouch Toggle

Yokotroit Dev Team:

  • Eve Adkins
  • Mark Hurley
  • Mason Griff
  • Mckayla Robbins
  • Meagan Bleyer
  • Will Brown
  • Yu Huan
